first_translate: listen carefully,  fiona.

hangle: 어니스트 공작은 내가 무슨 말을 하든 반대할 테니
first_translate: no matter what I say today, duke ernest will disagree...
so just ignore him.
pardon me...?

hangle: 현 황후를 배출한 가문을 그렇게 대해도 되는 거예요?
first_translate: is that how you treat someone from the family of the current empress?
it is.
the house of ernest supports the crown prince,

hangle: 새로운 황자인 시그렌을 보호하고 있는 헤일론과는 대립할 수밖에 없긴 한데,
first_translate: and since we’re protecting the new imperial son, sigren, they’ll naturally oppose us.
but still, ignoring them might not--
not only duke ernest.

hangle: 에레즈 가문도 황태자 지지 세력이니 무시해라.
first_translate: marquess ereze also supports the crown prince, so ignore her as well.
then what about houses priscilla and clovis?
they remain neutral for now,

hangle: 말이 중립이지 둘 다 그냥 간만 보고 있어.
first_translate: but don’t let their words fool you. both families are waiting to see which way things go before making any decisions.
I see.
this was more or less what I expected anyway.
welcome back, your grace.
everyone else awaits inside.
to sum up everything I’ve said thus far, fiona...
summing it all up?
do whatever you want.
that’s very much like something abel would say.
he’s here.
duke abel heilon.
seems I’m last again.
wow... look at this atmosphere.
certainly...

hangle: 저 불만 가득한 사람이 어니스트 공작.
first_translate: that man full of complaints must be duke ernest.
next to him is marquess ereze.
on abel's right side is marquess priscilla.
and finally...

hangle: 내 진짜 정체를 곧 알게 될
first_translate: soon enough, he'll find out my real identity.
marquess arendt clovis.

hangle: 왜 또 자리는 이렇게 맞은 편이어서~!
first_translate: why do I always end up sitting across from everyone?!
your grace.

hangle: 옆에 있는 그 영애는 누구인지 궁금하군.
first_translate: I wonder if you could tell me who that young lady next to you is.

hangle: 이곳은 가주와 후계자 외에는 참석할 수 없는 자리이네.
first_translate: she shouldn’t be allowed to attend such meetings unless she’s either the head of a noble household or its heir.
as a matter of fact, allow me to introduce her.
fiona heilon.
my successor.
huh...?
successor...?
didn’t know his grace had a daughter.
actually, she’s adopted.

hangle: …그렇다면 어느 가문의 아가씨를 양녀로 들인 건가?
first_translate: in that case, whose child did you take under your wing?
count green’s.

hangle: 어차피 이건 조금만 조사하면 금방 알 수 있는 것이니….
first_translate: you’d have found out soon enough after some research anyway...
the greens...?

hangle: 그 가문은 현재 마약 관련 사업 혐의로
first_translate: all members of that family are currently being investigated on charges related to illegal drug business dealings.

hangle: 가문의 일원이 전부 조사받고 있을 텐데.
first_translate: all members of that family are currently being investigated on charges related to illegal drug business dealings.

hangle: 이미 결혼한 탓에 처벌을 면한 딸이 하나 있다곤 들었지만.
first_translate: I heard there was one married daughter who managed to avoid punishment though.
no, actually, there were two daughters.

hangle: 그린가의 일을 제가 맡았기에 잘 알고 있죠.
first_translate: I took care of matters concerning house green myself, so I'm quite aware of these details.
yes, most of you probably already guessed by now,
but I am indeed the illegitimate daughter of house green.

hangle: 제가 처벌을 받지 않은 건 그 전에 호적에서 사라졌기 때문이죠.
first_translate: the reason why I wasn’t punished along with the rest of my family is because I left home long ago.
an illegitimate child from a fallen aristocratic family?
an illegitimate child from a fallen aristocratic family?
a mere girl barely into adulthood no less!

hangle: 본래 아들한테 가문을 물려주는 것이 원칙이거늘!
first_translate: normally, titles are passed down through sons!
are you testing our patience,
duke heilon?
of course not.
I can never accept this.

hangle: 몰락 귀족 가문의 사생아가 헤일론 공작 작위를 물려받다니.
first_translate: an illegitimate child from a fallen noble family inheriting the title of duke heilon?

hangle: 헤일론 가는 제국의 주요 가문 중 하나네.
first_translate: house heilon is among the major households within the empire.

hangle: 그런데 이토록 안하무인으로 행동하면 귀족 사회의 기강이 어떻게 되겠는가!
first_translate: if you act however you please without regard for others, think of what kind of impact that has on society!
if you wish to learn exactly what happens when people disregard social norms,
I shall make sure to pass down my title to my own daughter instead.
scary...

hangle: 어쨌거나 어니스트 공작이 무슨 생각을 하는진 알겠어.
first_translate: at least now I understand where duke ernest stands.

hangle: 공작은 머리가 굳을 대로 굳은 사람이다.
first_translate: he’s stubborn beyond belief.
being an illegitimate female child...

hangle: 거기에 어리기까지 하니 절대 인정할 수 없단 거다.
first_translate: ...who hasn’t even reached maturity yet makes me unacceptable in his eyes.
things may get complicated later on.
your grace.
I fully understand why you feel uneasy about this situation.

hangle: 예컨대, 제 능력이 미숙하여 가문을 지탱하기 힘들 걸 염려하시는 거겠죠?
first_translate: for instance, perhaps you worry whether I possess sufficient skills to manage the duchy properly?
as fellow nobles, I believe we share similar concerns regarding the future of our respective households.
ahem.
anyway, looks like talking to you is easier than speaking with your father.

hangle: 그렇다면 어떤 식으로 제 능력을 증명해야
first_translate: then how do you suggest I prove my abilities...
...in order to alleviate your worries?
prove yourself?

hangle: 너 같은 애가 딱히 할 수 있는 일은…
first_translate: what could a little brat like you possibly do--?
wait, that isn’t a bad idea.
house heilon serves as the shield of the empire.

hangle: 그 지방의 영주라면 응당 마물에 대응할 줄 알아야겠지.
first_translate: thus, anyone ruling over those lands needs to demonstrate proper combat skills against monsters.

hangle: 그러니 곧 열릴 사냥 대회에서 우승해 보여라.
first_translate: therefore, win first place at the upcoming hunting competition.

hangle: 네가 우승하면, 나 역시 더 이상 참견하지 않겠다.
first_translate: if you succeed, then I won’t bother you anymore.
now she’s speechless.

hangle: 하긴 칼자루 한 번 잡아보지 못했을 여자애한테 마물이라니.
first_translate: after all, a woman who’s never held a sword wouldn’t stand a chance against monsters.
my dear daughter!!!
she'd faint merely upon seeing a monster's tail.

hangle: 헤일론 공작의 창피가 눈에 선 한…
first_translate: how embarrassing for duke heil--
alright.
I promise to come in first during the monster-hunting tournament.
I didn’t expect things to resolve themselves so easily.
then...

hangle: 어니스트 공작님이 하신 제안의 증인은 우리가 하겠습니다.
first_translate: we shall serve as witnesses to your proposal, your grace.
v-very well.

hangle: …마물을 잡는다는 게 무슨 뜻인지는 아는 거겠지?
first_translate: by the way, do you even realize what fighting monsters entails?
of course I do.
don’t worry, I won’t run away or hide.
I’ll deal with them once and for all.
phew.
glad the meeting ended smoothly.
looks like his grace went downstairs ahead of me.
lady fiona.
th-this voice sounds familiar...

hangle: 이런 곳에서 다시 뵐 줄은 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I didn’t expect to meet you here.
sel-lin.
arendt clovis?!
